main event: A civilian reported observing a UFO in Centerville, Ohio on July 25, 1964, for about 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object entered the field of vision, stopped, and was observed before continuing across the sky, traveling fast to the southeast., The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes with no photographs or physical evidence available., A second object was noted traveling about 3 miles in the east or northeast direction., The observer's name was requested to remain confidential., The object appeared to be the size of a basketball when approximately 40 feet away.
